import React, { useState, useEffect, useRef } from 'react'; interface LongStayTripProps { onNavigate?: (page: string) => void; } const LongStayTrip: React.FC = ({ onNavigate }) => { const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('overview'); const [destinationCategories, setDestinationCategories] = useState<{[key: string]: string[]}>({}); const [isLoadingCategories, setIsLoadingCategories] = useState(false); const tabMenuRef = useRef(null); const [expandedCoverage, setExpandedCoverage] = useState<{[key: number]: boolean}>({}); const handleTabChange = (tab: string) => { setActiveTab(tab); // Scroll to the tab menu to show content from the beginning if (tabMenuRef.current) { const headerHeight = 64; // Height of the sticky header const section = tabMenuRef.current.closest('section'); if (section) { const sectionTop = section.getBoundingClientRect().top + window.scrollY; window.scrollTo({ top: sectionTop - headerHeight, behavior: 'smooth' }); } } }; useEffect(() => { window.scrollTo(0, 0); }, []); // Load destination categories and countries useEffect(() => { const loadDestinationCategories = async () => { try { setIsLoadingCategories(true); // Load categories const categoriesResponse = await fetch('http://localhost:5002/api/destination-categories'); const categoriesData = await categoriesResponse.json(); if (categoriesData.status === 'success') { const categories = categoriesData.categories; const categoriesWithCountries: {[key: string]: string[]} = {}; // Load countries for each category for (const category of categories) { try { const countriesResponse = await fetch(`http://localhost:5002/api/destination-categories/${encodeURIComponent(category)}/countries`); const countriesData = await countriesResponse.json(); if (countriesData.status === 'success') { categoriesWithCountries[category] = countriesData.countries; } } catch (error) { console.error(`Error loading countries for ${category}:`, error); categoriesWithCountries[category] = []; } } setDestinationCategories(categoriesWithCountries); } } catch (error) { console.error('Error loading destination categories:', error); } finally { setIsLoadingCategories(false); } }; loadDestinationCategories(); }, []); const renderTabContent = () => { switch (activeTab) { case 'overview': return (

{/* Section 1: Coverage */}

Long Stay Trip Coverage

Extended protection for long-term adventures and working holidays

🏥

Enhanced Medical Coverage

Up to €10,000,000 medical expenses coverage for extended trips up to 15 months.

💻

Business Equipment

Coverage up to €5,000 for laptops, cameras, and other business equipment essential for digital nomads.

📚

Study Materials

Protection for study materials and educational equipment during gap years and educational trips.

🏠

Temporary Accommodation

Coverage for emergency accommodation if your primary lodging becomes uninhabitable.

⚖️

Personal Liability

Enhanced personal liability coverage up to €5,000,000 for long-term stays.

🌍

Worldwide Coverage

Travel anywhere in the world for up to 15 months with 24/7 emergency assistance.

{/* Section 2: Secmondo APP */}

Secmondo Mobile App

Manage your travel insurance on-the-go with our intuitive mobile application. Access your policy, file claims, and get emergency support anytime, anywhere.

📱

Instant Policy Access

View and download your policy documents instantly

📸

Quick Claims Submission

Submit claims with photos directly from your phone

🆘

24/7 Emergency Support

One-tap access to emergency assistance worldwide

📲 App Store 📲 Google Play
📱

Secmondo App

✓ Digital policy cards
✓ Offline access
✓ Real-time claim tracking
✓ Travel alerts & tips
{/* Section 3: Why Choose Secmondo */}

Why Choose Secmondo?

Trusted by thousands of travelers worldwide for reliable coverage and exceptional service

🏆

Industry Leaders

Backed by Lloyd's of London and Helvetia Insurance, ensuring financial security and world-class coverage with over 500 years of combined experience.

💰

Competitive Pricing

Get comprehensive coverage at affordable rates with no hidden fees. Transparent pricing and flexible payment options to suit your budget.

⚡

Fast Claims Process

Quick and hassle-free claims processing. Our dedicated team ensures your claims are handled efficiently, getting you reimbursed faster.

🌟

24/7 Support

Round-the-clock customer support in multiple languages. Our emergency assistance team is always ready to help, wherever you are in the world.

{/* Section 4: Opinions */}

What Our Customers Say

Real experiences from travelers who trust Secmondo for their insurance needs

JD

James Davis

Digital Nomad

⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

"Perfect for my year-long working holiday in Australia! The long stay policy covered my laptop when it broke, and the claims process was smooth."

LM

Lucy Martinez

Gap Year Traveler

⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

"Excellent coverage for my gap year travels across Asia. Had a medical emergency in Vietnam and Secmondo took care of everything!"

TB

Tom Brown

Working Traveler

⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

"Great value for long-term travel. The business equipment coverage gave me peace of mind while working remotely across Europe."

{/* Section 5: More Coverages */}

Explore More Coverage Options

Find the perfect insurance policy for your travel needs

{/* Single Trip */}
✈️

Single Trip

For occasional travelers

Perfect for one-time vacations or business trips. Comprehensive coverage for trips up to 365 days with flexible options.

  • ✓ Coverage up to 365 days
  • ✓ €10M medical coverage
  • ✓ Trip cancellation included
  • ✓ Best for single holidays
Learn More
{/* Annual Multi-Trip */}
🌍

Annual Multi-Trip

Unlimited trips per year

Perfect for frequent travelers! Take unlimited trips throughout the year with continuous coverage. Each trip up to 45 days. Includes FREE 17-day Winter Sports coverage.

  • ✓ Unlimited trips annually
  • ✓ Up to 45 days per trip
  • ✓ Winter Sports included
  • ✓ Best value for frequent travelers
Learn More

Geographical Coverage
